description: This file defines a UserMapper class responsible for converting between User DTOs and UserEntity objects within a Java Spring application. It extends a base mapper and uses a nested BankAccountMapper for handling related bank account data during conversions.

classes.name: UserMapper
classes.description: A mapper class for converting between User DTOs and UserEntity objects, handling nested bank account data.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a User DTO into a UserEntity, copying properties and mapping bank accounts.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UserEntity into a User DTO, copying properties and mapping bank accounts.
